short_description: kdlaw is a divorce & family law attorney based in scottsdale, arizona, united states.
long_description: at kdlaw p.c. , we bring outstanding legal representation to our clients seeking help with divorce and family law issues in and around scottsdale. our firm was founded and is led by kiilu davis who has achieved the top professional status of certified family law specialist per the arizona bar. kdlaw p.c. prides itself on the high-quality legal representation we provide to clients facing difficult and challenging family issues. our legal team at kdlaw, p.c. prides itself on helping clients achieve fair and equitable results with all divorce and family law -related issues. our family law attorney in scottsdale offers aggressive litigation or alternative dispute resolutions for various family law matters. at kdlaw, p.c., we understand how difficult and emotional divorce and family law cases can be. attorney & founder kiilu davis is an experienced trial lawyer with a broad background. kiilu's practice is exclusively focused in family law and primarily involves complex matrimonial litigation, trial work and appeals.
generated_description: kdlaw, legally known as kdlaw p.c., is a law firm based in maricopa county, arizona, specializing in family law. the firm is led by kiilu davis, a certified family law specialist. provides legal services in areas such as divorce, child custody, child support, spousal maintenance, property division, and prenuptial agreements. the firm is known for its aggressive litigation approach in high-conflict cases and its commitment to achieving fair and equitable results. also offers mediation and special master work, and kiilu davis serves as a court-appointed parenting coordinator.
